articles.title: 'Mindblowing': how James Webb telescope's snapshots of infant universe transformed astronomy - The Guardian
articles.description: Their light took more than 13bn years to reach Nasa’s £6.8bn James Webb probe and this snapshot of the infant universe is thrilling scientists
